content.question: The Kerner Commission would most likely have attributed the “disorders” mentioned in the excerpt to

choices.label: high levels of unemployment among African Americans
the failure to pass civil rights legislation
the influence of a delinquent subculture
urban police forces’ failure to reduce the high crime rates

content.answer: high levels of unemployment among African Americans

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
